function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'imprimir'?
Is it impossible for function 'imprimir' to reach function 'main'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i<=n' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i<=n' always executed?
Can the loop with condition 'j<=n-i' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'j<=n-i' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i<=n' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'j<=n-i' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'n (line 3)' affect subsequent computations?
Does the value assigned to 'i (line 4)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Does variable 'i' remain in use at the end of function 'imprimir'?
Does variable 'j' remain in use at the end of function 'imprimir'?
